help.text:
*How to jam with Jazz Impro Bot* 🎶
1. Send /start and pick a root note.
2. Choose the chord quality and an accidental if needed.
3. I'll suggest a chord a fifth above to inspire your solo.

Use /cancel to stop and /start to begin again.

cancel.no_active: No active session. Use /start to begin.
